projects.title: Dev Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- Developer Portfolio Website made in React
 -  Fully customisable and dynamic, easily change data and images.
 - Dark Mode Support

projects.title: OpenGeorgia - excursion Georgia App
projects.bodyText:
- A OpenGeorgia web app made using **React**.
 - People can find a suitable excursion for themselves and book it.
 - Deployed on firebase.
